# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $80 by myself, reflecting its unique features and benefits. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or serve a valuable purpose in your life. Would you like to make this investment in yourself or someone you care about? Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need more information. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $80. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $80
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
